title.en: Must (ii) - Mustn't vs Don't have to (Prohibición vs No necesario)
title.es: Must (ii) - Mustn't vs Don't have to (Prohibición vs No necesario)

description.en: Learn to use 'mustn't' for prohibition (forbidden) vs 'don't have to' for lack of necessity (not required). Master the critical difference between these negative forms.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'mustn't' para prohibición (prohibido) vs 'don't have to' para falta de necesidad (no requerido). Domina la diferencia crítica entre estas formas negativas.

prompt.es: No debes pisar el césped.

exercises.solution: You mustn't walk on the grass.

tip.en: 'Mustn't' expresses prohibition - something is forbidden or not allowed. Use for rules, laws, or strong personal restrictions.
tip.es: 'Mustn't' expresa prohibición - algo está prohibido o no está permitido. Usa para reglas, leyes o restricciones personales fuertes.

prompt.es: No debo olvidar hacer mi declaración de la renta.

exercises.solution: I mustn't forget to do my tax return.

tip.en: 'Mustn't' expresses prohibition - something is forbidden or not allowed. Use for rules, laws, or strong personal restrictions.
tip.es: 'Mustn't' expresa prohibición - algo está prohibido o no está permitido. Usa para reglas, leyes o restricciones personales fuertes.

prompt.es: No debes discutir con tu profesora.

exercises.solution: You mustn't argue with your teacher.

exercises.solution: You don't have to be there early to get a ticket.

tip.en: 'Don't have to' means not necessary - you have a choice, it's optional. Something is not required but not forbidden either.
tip.es: 'Don't have to' significa no necesario - tienes opción, es opcional. Algo no es requerido pero tampoco está prohibido.

prompt.es: No tienes que matarte para que te asciendan.

exercises.solution: You don't have to kill yourself to get promoted.
